fields_of_interest: Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Plastic Strategy, Circular Economy, Interface Plastic - chemicals, Waste Directive, Transboundary transportation, Persistant Organic Pollutants
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The PolyStyreneLoop project will 
demonstrate how PS value-chain partners 
have a strong desire to contribute to the 
Circular Economy and meet the requirements 
by ensuring technically, economically and 
environmentally sustainable recycling. 
We aim to built a plant in 2019 for  a capcity of 3300 mtons/y of polystyrene foam containing a restricted substance /flame retardant HBCD. The polystyrene will be recovered and put back in the same application- upcycling. The HBCD is separated and afterwards destrcuted and the bromine is recovered
relevant_communication:
The PolystyreneLoop initiative is funded through the entire value chain, is supported with a loan from RABO bank and has received a grant under the umbrella of the EU initiated LIFE Subsidy program, the project is known under LIFE-PSLoop LIFE16ENV/NL/000271 
All info avaialble on the webpage about our activities
